雃字的基本解释

雃
jiān
古通“鳽”。

雃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》苦堅切，平先，溪。］
鸟名。亦为人名用字。春秋时秦有士雃。见《左传·襄公九年》。

雃字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　雃； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1365第11
【正字通】雃字譌省。

【唐韻】【正韻】苦堅切【集韻】【韻會】輕煙切，?音牽。【說文】石鳥。一名雝?，一名精列，从隹幵聲。　又人名。【左傳·襄九年】秦伯使士雃乞師于楚。【釋文】苦田反。　又【廣韻】俄寒切【集韻】俄干切，?音豻。雃䲽，鳥名。??。　又【集韻】丘耕切，音牼。又倪堅切，音姸。義?同。　又【集韻】逆革切，音虉。同鳽。鵁鶄也。　【集韻】本作鳽。【玉篇】省作雃，非。
雃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
雃字的起名意思

暂无。

雃
Basic explanation of words
雃
jiān
Gu Tong "Bitter".
雃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
["Guangyun" bitter and hard cut, flat first, stream. ]
The name of the bird. It is also used for names. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Qin Youshiyu. See "Zuo Zhuan · Xianggong Nine Years".
雃
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【隹字部】　雃; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1365 No. 11
【Zhengzitong】The word 雃譌省. [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] bitter and hard cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Lightly smoked,? Sound leads. [Said the text] Stone bird. One Yong?, the other Jingli, from the sound of the 隹幵.　Another name. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Nine Years] Qin Bo's envoy Yu Chu. [Explanation] Kutian anti.　[Guangyun] Russian cold cut [Jiyun] Russian dry cut,? Yinhong.雃䲽, the name of the bird. ??.　[Jiyun] Qiu Gengqie, sound. And Ni Jianqie, Yin Fei. Righteous? Same.　 [Ji Yun] Reverse leather cut, sound 虉. Same as bitter.鵁鶄也.　【Jiyun】This is a bitter. 【Jade articles】Province as 雃, non.
